Ayamelum bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na steeti Anambra, ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ dị na Anaku
Towns that make up the local government are Omor, Umueje, Omasi, Igbakwu, Umumbo, Anaku, Umuerum, Ifite Ogwari.
Now a bu uloakwukwo ndi di na Lokal Goomenti Ayamelum Lokal Goomenti Aria:
St.Simon Faith Faith International Sekondiri Skul,Omor(Obodo Omor nke Anglikan)
Brainfield Sekondiri Skul,Omor(Private Owner Omor Town)
Sacred Heart of Jesus Academy,Ifite-Ogwari(Katolik Skul)
